name: solana-actionforge
description: ActionForge monorepo for Solana Actions/Blinks validation, chaining helpers, and conformance harness

scripts.build: npm run build -w @idoa/actionforge-validator && npm run build -w @idoa/actionforge-chain && npm run build -w @idoa/actionforge-harness && npm run build:examples
scripts.build:examples: tsup examples/basic-action-endpoint/src/server.ts --format cjs --out-dir examples/basic-action-endpoint/dist && tsup examples/chained-action-endpoint/src/server.ts --format cjs --out-dir examples/chained-action-endpoint/dist
scripts.demo:test: npm run build && npm exec -- actionforge-validator validate examples/basic-action-endpoint/valid-response.json && npm exec -- actionforge-harness run --endpoint http://127.0.0.1:3001 --fixtures packages/harness/fixtures --out reports/actionforge-report.json
scripts.demo: node -e "console.log('Terminal 1: npm run demo:server\nTerminal 2: npm run demo:test')" && npm run demo:test
